Get a data frame containing the available indel signatures

Source: R/RcppExports.R
MutationEngine-cash-get_indel_signatures.Rd

This method returns a data frame containing the available indel signatures and the corresponding mutation probability. The first column ("Type") describes a mutation in a context, while each of the remaining columns contains the probabilities of the mutations for one of the available indel signatures.

Value

A data frame containing the available indel signatures.

Examples

# build a mutation engine
m_engine <- build_mutation_engine(setup_code = "demo")
#> 
 [█---------------------------------------] 0% [00m:00s] Loading context index                                                                                                                                      

 [████████████████████████████████████████] 100% [00m:00s] Context index loaded                                                                                                                                     

#> 
 [█---------------------------------------] 0% [00m:00s] Loading RS index                                                                                                                                           

 [████████████████████--------------------] 48% [00m:01s] Loading RS index                                                                                                                                          

 [█████████████████████████████████████---] 92% [00m:02s] Loading RS index                                                                                                                                          

 [████████████████████████████████████████] 100% [00m:02s] RS index loaded                                                                                                                                          

#> 
 [█---------------------------------------] 0% [00m:00s] Loading germline                                                                                                                                           

 [████████████████████████████████████████] 100% [00m:00s] Germline loaded                                                                                                                                          


# get the indel data frame
head(m_engine$get_indel_signatures(), 5)
